item.title: USAID worker blames 'stress and strain' of aid freeze for wife's pregnancy scare
item.description: A U.S. foreign service officer blamed the Trump administration's "cruel and harmful shutdown" of USAID for threatening the lives of his pregnant wife ...

item.title: WATCH: Skiers seek ultimate thrill on erupting Mount Etna
item.description: The professional skiers made their way down Sicily's Mount Etna with a glowing lava field alongside them.

item.title: Hamas to release 6 more hostages, bodies of 4 others
item.description: Hamas will release six more hostages on Saturday and the bodies of four deceased hostages on Thursday, Hamas and Israel confirmed.

item.title: Despite Trump's comments on Gaza, some Arab Americans still support him
item.description: Some members of the Arab American community still believe Donald Trump was a better candidate than Kamala Harris, despite his comments on Gaza.

item.title: US and Russia agree to try to end war without Ukraine at the table
item.description: Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelenskyy was not invited to participate.
